name: edelweiss
content:

a mountain plant with small white flowers and grey-green leaves: It was an edelweiss, the symbolic flower of the German mountain troops. The alpine star, otherwise known as edelweiss, grows only at high altitude.
More examplesFewer examplesHe took three days to climb through the all the cows and daisies to get to the snow and blooming edelweiss of the upper slopes.On the way down we spotted Swiss flowers, such as the intense blue gentian and the iconic edelweiss.They wear distinctive caps with pins of the edelweiss flower on the side.The real lure of Mongolia is the chance to roam endless fields of wild grasses and edelweiss.
